meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>root</kanji> that this is <kanji>based on</kanji> is the <vocabulary>basis</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>grounds</vocabulary> for my argument. Look, it goes all the way down to the root problem!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
